snippet: The hand of the choreographer, Ohad Naharin, the artistic director of Batsheva Dance Company, is felt throughout “Hora,” a work he created in 2009.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews performance by Batsheva Dance Company at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: The hand of the choreographer, Ohad Naharin, the artistic director of Batsheva Dance Company, is felt throughout “Hora,” a work he created in 2009.

headline.seo: Batsheva Dance Company at Brooklyn Academy of Music
headline.main: Stylized Dancing Cogs in a Surreal Machine
headline.print_headline: Stylized Dancing Cogs in a Surreal Machine
